thread.title: We celebrate Elizabeth II becoming Britain's longest-serving monarch
thread.title_full: We celebrate Elizabeth II becoming Britain's longest-serving monarch - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: We celebrate Elizabeth II becoming Britain's longest-serving monarch
text: On September 9, Queen Elizabeth II will become the longest-serving monarch in British history. She has also been the most photographed- and in her 63 years of dressing for the public eye, has never put a patent-court-shod foot wrong. Head of state is a job that comes with a dress code, from prim pre-war dresses to home-front simplicity, to the splendour befitting the heir to the throne, we trace Elizabeth II's early style and travel the colour spectrum with the brightest looks from her reign. Pick up The Telegraph this Saturday, September 5 and Sunday, September 6, and join us to celebrate our longest-serving monarch, including a twenty-seven page special in Stella magazine dedicated to her Majesty. @telegraph
